title: Islamic Nato in making? How Turkish arms, Saudi cash and Pak nukes could align
content: Turkey is reportedly in advanced talks to join a defence pact between Pakistan and Saudi Arabia, mirroring Nato mutual defence clause. This potential alliance aims to bolster regional security amid shifting global dynamics and perceived US unreliability. The pact leverages Saudi financial strength, Pakistan's nuclear arsenal, and Turkey's military expertise and growing defence industry.

title: 'Who is he?': Trump's dig at Greenland PM as he 'chooses' Denmark over US
content: Trump has openly been pushing for the United States to acquire Greenland, dismissing Denmark‚Äôs role and warning that the Arctic island could otherwise fall under Russian or Chinese influence. Asked whether he had made a tangible offer to Greenland or Denmark, Trump replied, ‚ÄúI haven‚Äôt done that. But Greenland should make the deal because Greenland does not want to see Russia or China take over.‚Äù

title: What about 'Chak Lo Revolver'? Haryana singers fume as cops hit pause on 67 songs
content: Haryana Police removed 67 songs glorifying violence and gangsterism from online platforms, citing negative influence on youth. Singer Masoom Sharma advocated for broader laws against obscenity and gambling apps, arguing against targeting individual artists. The DGP stated this action aims to protect young people from crime, emphasizing the harsh realities of criminal life.

title: One-ball endgame: ICC ball tweak ‚Äî why teams are rethinking death-overs batting
content: The Indian cricket team is adapting to new batting strategies for ODIs following a rule change allowing only one ball per innings after the 34th over. Batting coach Sitanshu Kotak highlighted the need for a new approach, especially for the death overs, as older balls become softer and harder to hit.

title: Sergey Brin becomes third richest; Beats Jeff Bezos and Oracle's Larry Ellison: How Apple may have helped
content: Sergey Brin, co-founder of Google, has ascended to become the world's third richest person with a net worth of $255.6 billion. This surge is attributed to Alphabet's market value surpassing $4 trillion, significantly boosted by Apple's partnership to integrate Google's Gemini AI into its devices and Siri.

title: Watch: Trump hurls abuse, shows middle finger to Ford worker who shouted ‚Äòpedophile protector‚Äô
content: During a Michigan visit, President Trump appeared to react angrily to a heckler shouting an insult, with video showing him gesturing with an expletive and the middle finger. This incident occurs amid ongoing scrutiny over the handling of files related to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, a figure Trump has past associations with.

title: Stock market today: Which are top 10 gainers and losers on NSE & BSE? Check list
content: Indian equity benchmarks opened Wednesday's session with uncertainty, fluctuating between gains and losses. Investors remained cautious due to continued foreign fund selling and global tariff concerns. Despite some heavyweight stocks weighing down the indices, gains in Tata Steel, Axis Bank, and NTPC provided support.

title: 22 killed in Thailand: Passenger train derails after crane collapses on it; several feared trapped
content: At least 22 people were killed and more than 30 injured on Wednesday after a crane at an under-construction high-speed rail line in Thailand collapsed onto a passenger train, causing its derailment.  The accident happened in Sikhio district, Nakhon Ratchasima province, about 230 km northeast of Bangkok. Rescue operations are ongoing.

title: Amazon's RTO gets stricter: Managers tracking hours; three types of employees under scanner
content: Amazon is now closely monitoring office attendance, tracking not just presence but also exact hours spent by corporate employees. This escalation in surveillance, revealed by an internal document, flags 'Low-Time Badgers' and 'Zero Badgers' who don't meet in-office expectations. The move follows a strict five-day return-to-office mandate, with similar tracking systems emerging at tech rivals like Samsung and Dell.

title: Death order in 2 days: Who is Erfan Soltani? 1st anti-Khamenei protester set to be hanged
content: Iran is set to execute a 26-year-old man, Erfan Soltani, arrested just last week amid widespread protests. His family claims he received a death sentence within two days without a trial, with execution slated for Wednesday. This case raises alarms as potentially the first execution linked to the current unrest, prompting a strong warning from US President Donald Trump.

title: 'Not about Right or Left but Right and Wrong': The Clintons pen letter on Epstein probe
content: Bill and Hillary Clinton have refused to testify in a House investigation into Jeffrey Epstein, calling the probe "legally invalid" and accusing the Republican chair of a process designed for their "imprisonment." The Clintons stated they will "forcefully defend" themselves against the subpoena.

title: AI infrastructure debate: Amazon founder on private data centres; ‚ÄòJust plug into the grid‚Äô
content: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos criticizes the current trend of companies building private AI data centers, likening it to early 20th-century factories generating their own power. He argues this approach is inefficient and predicts a shift towards centralized cloud services like AWS.

title: PM Modi wishes Makar Sankranti, Magh Bihu; celebrates Pongal in Delhi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi extended greetings on Makar Sankranti, Pongal, and Magh Bihu, celebrating India's diverse harvest festivals. He highlighted their significance in honoring nature, farmers, and cultural traditions, wishing for prosperity and well-being for all citizens.

title: T20 WC: Has India denied visas to Pak-born US cricketers? The real story
content: Speculation arose after US cricketer Ali Khan's social media post suggested visa denials for Pakistan-origin players ahead of the T20 World Cup. Officials clarified that no visas have been rejected; applications for four US players of Pakistani origin are undergoing standard administrative review, a routine process for such cases.

title: Trump's big credit card move! Interest capped at 10% - what it means for Americans?
content: US President Trump's proposal for a 10% credit card interest rate cap aims to ease affordability, potentially saving consumers billions. However, critics warn this could restrict credit access for those with lower scores and negatively impact the broader economy. The banking industry strongly opposes the move, citing severe consequences for consumers and the economy.

title: Vanessa Bryant recalls Kobe Bryant‚Äôs iconic footwork vs Charlotte Hornets
content: Vanessa Bryant continues to honor her late husband, Kobe Bryant, by sharing cherished memories. Recently, she posted a throwback clip of Kobe's incredible 2008 dunk against the Charlotte Hornets, highlighting his 'Mamba Mentality.'  She also expressed gratitude on behalf of the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation for the support enabling opportunities for young athletes.

title: Justin Rose and Kate Phillips net worth timeline from 2016 to 2026
content: Justin Rose and his wife Kate Phillips have built a combined net worth estimated at $50‚Äì$60 million by 2026, driven by Rose‚Äôs sustained PGA Tour success, endorsements, and long-term investments. Their wealth has grown steadily over a decade, reflecting consistent performance, careful financial planning, and ongoing involvement in business and philanthropy.

title: Aaron Rodgers accused of emotional abuse by ex Danica Patrick amid wife mystery
content: Aaron Rodgers' marriage and wife, Brittani, continues to be a mystery even after the two have been reportedly been married for more than half a year. Amid all the mess, Aaron Rodgers' ex, Danica Patrick, has made controversial claims against the NFL veteran about the relationship the two shared for over two years. Aaron Rodgers continues to stay distant from all the drama.

title: Nipah virus in India: As cases emerge from West Bengal, doctor shares dos and don'ts to stay safe
content: Two Nipah virus cases have surfaced in West Bengal, with both affected individuals being nurses. One is in a coma, the other critical, exhibiting fever and respiratory issues.  The Union Health Minister has pledged full support to the state.  No specific treatments exist for this highly fatal virus, naturally carried by fruit bats.

title: Gold price prediction: Will gold, silver price rally continue in the coming days?
content: Gold price prediction today: Maneesh Sharma of Anand Rathi Shares and Stock Brokers sees the gold and silver price rally continuing amidst ongoing global economic and geopolitical uncertainty.

title: 'Why change now?': BMC vote count goes slow lane; phase-wise plan rattles candidates
content: This year, Mumbai is shaking things up for its civic election vote counting, opting for a phased approach that's quite different from the one used in 2017. Election authorities will focus their efforts on two wards out of the 227 total, aiming for a more efficient process.

title: Bengaluru horror: Restaurant security guard smashes puppy to death
content: A young puppy was brutally assaulted and killed in JP Nagar, with CCTV footage showing a man smashing the animal against a wall. Animal welfare volunteers reported the incident, and police are now searching for the accused, identified as Nepal Kiran, who is reportedly absconding.

title: 2027 WC: Jadeja under the ODI glare ‚Äî at the centre of No. 5 all-rounder debate
content: Ravindra Jadeja is under scrutiny to maintain his position as India's premier ODI spin-bowling all-rounder. Axar Patel is reportedly the preferred choice for the 2027 ODI World Cup. Jadeja is on trial to prove his relevance in the team's future ODI plans. The team management is building a pool of backups for all positions.

title: Lakers vs Hawks injury report: who‚Äôs out, questionable and how to watch
content: The Los Angeles Lakers face the Atlanta Hawks tonight. Both teams are battling injuries to key players. The Lakers are playing on a back-to-back, while the Hawks have won their last three games. With multiple players questionable, the game's outcome may depend on adaptability. Jalen Johnson is expected to lead the Hawks. Luka Doncic's availability is crucial for the Lakers.

title: Makar Sankranti 2026: Rituals, traditions and what to do on this auspicious day
content: Makar Sankranti ushers in the Sun's northward journey, symbolizing renewed energy and light. This auspicious festival emphasizes physical and spiritual cleansing through early morning rituals, prayer, and meditation. Acts of charity, sharing sesame and jaggery, and community gatherings mark the day, fostering warmth and harmony.

title: 21-year-old air hostess dies by suicide near Mumbai; ex-partner booked for abetment
content: A 21-year-old air hostess was found dead in Thane, leading police to book her 23-year-old ex-partner for abetting suicide. Allegations include threats to release photos, refusal to marry, and a new relationship, reportedly driving the victim to despair. Investigations revealed financial exploitation and physical assault, prompting the FIR.

title: New record! China trade surplus hits $1.2 trillion - what‚Äôs the outlook for 2026?
content: China achieved a record trade surplus of nearly $1.2 trillion in 2025, driven by robust exports to global markets that compensated for reduced shipments to the United States. Despite ongoing trade friction, experts predict exports will continue to be a significant growth driver for China's economy in 2026, with the trade surplus expected to remain above $1 trillion.

title: Delhi HC orders removal of unauthorised images of Bhuvan Bam
content: After Salman Khan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Kumar Sanu, Nagarjuna among other celebrities, the Delhi High Court on Tuesday directed the removal of images of YouTuber and actor Bhuvan Bam that were uploaded and circulated on various platforms without his consent. However, the court refrained from granting interim protection on the broader issue of his personality and publicity rights at this stage.

title: Several flights unable to land as Bhogi smoke reduces visibility at Chennai airport
content: Chennai airport faced flight disruptions Wednesday morning as dense smoke from Bhogi festival celebrations reduced runway visibility to just 300 meters.  Authorities anticipate improvement later today. The Pollution Control Board urged a smoke-free celebration, highlighting environmental and health risks from burning waste like plastics and tires, which have previously impacted flights and public well-being.

title: 'Even if effort fails‚Ä¶': DKS' cryptic post after Rahul meet fuels CM change buzz
content: Karnataka Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar's cryptic social media post after a meeting with Rahul Gandhi has fueled speculation about a leadership change in the state. Despite Chief Minister Siddaramaiah's denial of political discussions, the brief one-on-one interaction between Gandhi and Shivakumar at Mysuru airport has sparked renewed political buzz.

title: Arki market fire death toll climbs to 10; 6 LPG cylinders exploded in building
content: A fierce blaze swept through the bustling Arki market in Solan, claiming 10 precious lives, among them nine Nepalese nationals and an eight-year-old boy from Bihar. The fire erupted, devastating the area due to multiple cylinder explosions in a wooden edifice, transforming the market into a scene of destruction.

title: Iran to hang anti-Khamenei protesters: Trump vows 'strong action'; assures 'help on its way'
content: US President Donald Trump issued a stern warning to Iran, vowing strong action if authorities proceed with executions amid widespread protests.  Trump stated that the US would respond forcefully if hangings commence, emphasizing that killing thousands of people would have severe consequences for Iran. He also indicated that the US is monitoring the situation closely and will act accordingly.

title: ICE criticism, Iran silence: How Golden Globes exposed Hollywood's hypocrisy
content: Golden Globe attendees wore anti-ICE pins to protest the recent killing of Renee Good by an ICE officer. This political statement contrasted with last year's ceremony, highlighting ongoing protests and calls for accountability. The article questions Hollywood's silence on the protests in Iran, suggesting reasons like "Trump Derangement System" and the complexity of the Iranian narrative.

title: 'Immediately sever all contact': After US, Israel withdraws from several UN agencies
content: Israel is severing ties with several UN agencies and international bodies, citing persistent bias and hostile actions. This decision follows a review prompted by the US withdrawal from similar organizations. The affected bodies include UN Women and the UN Conference on Trade and Development, with specific grievances cited regarding children in conflict and sexual violence allegations.

title: After Sabarimala gold theft, Rs 35L ‚Äòghee scam‚Äô under lens
content: The Kerala High Court has ordered a vigilance probe into alleged misappropriation of over Rs 35 lakh from the sale of leftover ghee at Sabarimala. The court directed the vigilance director to form a team and register a crime based on a report highlighting discrepancies in fund remittance from ghee packet sales. A progress report is due within a month.

title: Ajit Pawar rules out merger talks with Sharad Pawar, denies BJP ‚Äòmatch-fixing‚Äô
content: Deputy CM Ajit Pawar indicated a potential reunion with his uncle Sharad Pawar, stating he believes in "addition, not subtraction" in politics. He admitted that the bitterness between the two NCP factions has subsided following their alliance for the Pune and Pimpri-Chinchwad civic polls, making the contest against the BJP tighter.

title: Row erupts in Kerala over stop memo on preparatory work for ‚ÄòKumbh Mela‚Äô
content: Revenue authorities in Malappuram have issued a stop memo for preparatory work on the Bharatapuzha River for the Mahamagha Mahotsavam, citing violations of the Kerala River Protection Act. Organizers, however, claim they had obtained necessary permissions and intend to proceed with the event, alleging attempts to disrupt Hindu religious rites.

title: Rupee rebounds! Currency rises 11 paise in early trade; reaches 90.12 against US dollar
content: The Indian rupee opened weaker on Wednesday, continuing its downward trend against the US dollar. This decline is attributed to rising crude oil prices, geopolitical tensions, and foreign fund outflows. While global risk aversion and weak domestic markets are pressuring the currency, optimism around a potential India-US trade deal and a possible rate cut may offer support.

title: 'Consistent': Why Virat has always stayed ahead of Rohit in ODIs ‚Äî ex-India batter explains
content: Mohammad Kaif attributes Virat Kohli's ODI dominance over Rohit Sharma to his exceptional mindset and ability to convert starts into match-winning scores. Kaif highlighted Kohli's self-awareness and relentless standards, even after a significant knock. Kohli's recent fifty-plus streak in ODIs is also noted, bringing him closer to a new Indian record.

title: 2 held for roaming around at Har Ki Pauri in 'sheikh' attire
content: A video has emerged that shows two individuals in traditional garb, who claim to be Dubai residents and YouTube influencers, at the iconic Har Ki Pauri. This development has reignited debates about restricting non-Hindu access to the sacred Ganga ghats. Investigators are delving into the identities and motives of the men involved, and await further actions based on their findings.

content: a prominent figure on the west coast rap scene, the legendary rapper moved to Baltimore from the Bronx in 1985 . he went to middle school and high school in Baltimore before moving to Marin City, Calif. in 1988 . on may 8th, we're celebrating the life and legacy of legendary rapper and actor Tupac Shakur .

content: all college baseball on ESPN, ESPN2, ESPNU, SEC Network, ACC Network, Big 12 Now on ESPN+, ESPN3, ESPN+ and ACCNX is available on the ESPN App . a team from the SEC has been dominating college baseball as of late .

title: Women's AP Top 25 poll reaction: What to know about every team
content: the new AP top 25 women's college basketball poll is out . the rankings are out for the second time since the calendar turned to 2026 . a slew of upsets over the past week left just three undefeated teams .

title: NFL futures: Seahawks remain Super Bowl favorites; Patriots now AFC front-runner
content: The top two teams in the NFC West have the best odds to win the  Super Bowl . The  Seattle Seahawks  are the favorites to win Super Bowl 60, following closely by the division rival  Los Angeles Rams , who advanced to the divisional round with a win on Saturday.  The  New England Patriots  and  Buffalo Bills  are now the top two favorites in the AFC after advancing to the Divisional round on Sunday. The AFC West-winning  Denver Broncos  have the fifth-best odds to win the Super Bowl despite being the top overall seed in the AFC. They, like the Seahawks, had a bye in the first round. Here are the Super Bowl odds and conference championship odds for every team still in the hunt. Note: Odds by  DraftKings Sportsbook  and subject to change.

title: College football buzz: What we're hearing about playoff expansion
content: a 16-team college football playoff format to begin as soon as 2026, sources say . there's still a stalemate between the two powerbrokers . the deadline for completing the format moved from Dec. 1 to Jan. 23, 2026 .

content: Denver Broncos defensive coordinator Vance Joseph was 38 years old . his r√©sum√© includes coordinator gigs with the Miami Dolphins and the Arizona Cardinals . he had just completed six years as a defensive backs coach with the Texans .

title: State of the AL East: What's next for Yankees, Red Sox, Jays, Rays and O's
content: the defending AL champions have invested the most money in free agency this winter . the Boston Red Sox are the only MLB club yet to sign a free agent to a major league contract . however, the Baltimore Orioles have made significant trades to improve their roster .

content: leo Carlsson's goal in the shootout proves to be the difference for the Ducks . the 21-year-old forward was sitting second in league scoring with 10 goals and 25 points . he's got two goals and six points in his past 15 games . his most recent marker is in Anaheim's 5-3-1 win over the pennsylvania .

title: Pongal, Bihu, Sankranti and beyond: Tracing the harvest celebrations of India
content: mid-January marks the easing of winter, the completion of harvest cycles, and the promise of longer days ahead . it is also among the earliest major festival periods of the year, arriving with near-universal observance but strikingly different expressions . each state and region interpret the season through its own rituals and memories .

title: Nasa wants to put a nuclear reactor on the Moon by 2030
content: The TOI Science Desk stands as an inquisitive team of journalists, ceaselessly delving into the realms of discovery to curate a captivating collection of news, features, and articles from the vast and ever-evolving world of science for the readers of The Times of India.
